Name: DIE, INSECT!
Description: Hero PowerDeal 8 damage to a random enemy.

Name: Tuskarr Totemic
Description: Battlecry: Summon a random basic Totem.
Lore: Turns out the tuskarr aren't real choosy about their totems.

Name: Undercity Valiant
Description: Combo: Deal 1 damage.
Lore: Almost went to play for Stormwind before signing with Undercity.

Name: Warhorse Trainer
Description: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +1 Attack.
Lore: He doesn't even get Sundays off.  Every day he's hostling.

Name: Wildwalker
Description: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +3 Health.
Lore: She was born to be something.  She is just not quite sure what yet...

Name: Power Overwhelming
Description: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.
Lore: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is.  It's CRAZY bad!  Maybe worse than that.  Just don't do it.

Name: Silvermoon Guardian
Description: Divine Shield
Lore: The first time they tried to guard Silvermoon against the scourge, it didn’t go so well…

Name: Slam
Description: Deal 2 damage to a minion.  If it survives, draw a card.
Lore: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

Name: Snipe
Description: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal 4 damage to it.
Lore: A great sniper hits the spot.  Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.

Name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
Description: Your spells cost (1) less.
Lore: Apprentices are great for bossing around.  "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee!  Make that a mana coffee!"

Name: Soul of the Forest
Description: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."
Lore: "Reforestation" is suddenly a terrifying word.

Name: Ship's Cannon
Description: After you summon a Pirate, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
Lore: If you hear someone yell, "Cannonball!" you're about to get wet. Or crushed.

Name: Shrinkmeister
Description: Battlecry: Give a minion -2 Attack this turn.
Lore: After the debacle of the Gnomish World Enlarger, gnomes are wary of size-changing inventions.

Name: Vitality Totem
Description: At the end of your turn, restore 4 Health to your hero.
Lore: You can usually find these at the totemist's market on Saturdays.

Name: Ancestor's Call
Description: Put a random minion from each player's hand into the battlefield.
Lore: "Hey! Ancestors!" - Ancestor's call

Name: Anima Golem
Description: At the end of each turn, destroy this minion if it's your only one.
Lore: The Dark Animus is evil and mysterious and huge and unable to write sentences that utilize proper grammar.

Name: Bouncing Blade
Description: Deal 1 damage to a random minion. Repeat until a minion dies.
Lore: Only goblins would think this was a good idea. Even they are starting to have their doubts.

Name: Fire Elemental
Description: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage.
Lore: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

Name: Fireball
Description: Deal 6 damage.
Lore: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

Name: Flamestrike
Description: Deal 4 damage to all enemy minions.
Lore: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

Name: Maexxna
Description: Poisonous
Lore: Maexxna gets super mad when people introduce her as "Maxina" or "Maxxy".

Name: Stalagg
Description: Deathrattle: If Feugen also died this game, summon Thaddius.
Lore: Stalagg want to write own flavor text.  "STALAGG AWESOME!"

Name: Jade Claws
Description: Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem. Overload: (1)
Lore: "Best manicure ever!" - Aya Blackpaw

Name: Jade Idol
Description: Choose One - Summon a Jade Golem; or Shuffle 3 copies of this card into your deck.
Lore: Shuffle or no guts.

Name: Jinyu Waterspeaker
Description: Battlecry: Restore 6 Health. Overload: (1)
Lore: Waterspeakers can tell the future! So the Jade Lotus employs them to speculate on the Auction House.

Name: Kabal Courier
Description: Battlecry: Discover a Mage, Priest or Warlock card.
Lore: Hey, you park your kodo under a harpy nest, you get what you deserve.

Name: Inkmaster Solia
Description: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, the next spell you cast this turn costs (0).
Lore: Solia marks the Kabal with intricate tattoos that grant immense power. Also it makes it harder for other gangs to recruit from their numbers. BACK OFF, GOONS.

Name: Kazakus
Description: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, create a custom spell.
Lore: The mysterious leader of the Kabal is NOT a dragon, and does NOT deal in illegal potions. Any public statements to the contrary will be met with litigation and Dragonfire Potions.

Name: Solemn Vigil
Description: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Lore: Each year, folk gather in front of Blackrock Mountain to mourn those who were mind-controlled into the lava.

Name: Twilight Whelp
Description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +2 Health.
Lore: The twilight whelps are basically magic-vampires. Despite this, they are not a reference to any popular series of novels.

Name: Molten Reflection
Description: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it.
Lore: Dang, I'm looking pretty hot!

Name: Stormwatcher
Description: Windfury
Lore: Aspiring meteorologist!

Name: Stubborn Gastropod
Description: TauntPoisonous
Lore: Stubbornly pursuing its dream to become Azeroth's fastest animal!

Name: Humongous Razorleaf
Description: Can't attack.
Lore: Loves goblins. In a light cream sauce.

Name: Clutchmother Zavas
Description: Whenever you discard this, give it +2/+2 and return it to your hand.
Lore: A bit of a snob: still refuses to drive anything with automatic transmission.

Name: The Marsh Queen
Description: Quest: Play seven 1-Cost minions.Reward: Queen Carnassa.
Lore: Question: What's scarier, one giant angry dinosaur or 15 smaller vicious ones? Answer: AHHHHHHH THEY FOUND MEEEEEE

Name: Gazlowe
Description: Whenever you cast a 1-mana spell, add a random Mech to your hand.
Lore: Gazlowe was voted "Most Likely to Explode" in high school.

Name: Hemet Nesingwary
Description: Battlecry: Destroy a Beast.
Lore: It's hard to make a living as a hunter in a world where beasts instantly reappear minutes after you kill them.

Name: Iron Juggernaut
Description: Battlecry: Shuffle a Mine into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 10 damage.
Lore: The Iron Juggernaut guards Orgrimmar and has just earned the "Employee of the Month" award!

Name: Grim Patron
Description: Whenever this minion survives damage, summon another Grim Patron.
Lore: If you love getting your face punched, come to the Grim Guzzler!

Name: Lava Shock
Description: Deal 2 damage.Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
Lore: Chocolate lava cake is shockingly delicious.

Name: Sabretooth Stalker
Description: Stealth
Lore: It's gotten a bit long in the tooth.

Name: Elise the Trailblazer
Description: Battlecry: Shuffle a sealed Un'Goro pack into your deck.
Lore: Reno taught her that blazing her own trail is a lot more fun than following someone else's map.

Name: The Voraxx
Description: After you cast a spell on this minion, summon a 1/1 Plant and cast another copy on it.
Lore: I am the Voraxx. I speak for the weeds.

Name: Elven Archer
Description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
Lore: Don't bother asking her out on a date.  She'll shoot you down.

Name: Humility
Description: Change a minion's Attack to 1.
Lore: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That's "Humidity."

Name: Hunter's Mark
Description: Change a minion's Health to 1.
Lore: Never play 'Hide and Go Seek' with a  Hunter.

Name: Innervate
Description: Gain 2 Mana Crystals this turn only.
Lore: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

Name: Ironbark Protector
Description: Taunt
Lore: I dare you to attack Darnassus.

Name: Blowgill Sniper
Description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
Lore: Imagine how much further his darts would go if he had lungs instead of gills!

Name: Call in the Finishers
Description: Summon four 1/1 Murlocs.
Lore: When you really need a job done… but you don't really care if it gets done right.

Name: Seadevil Stinger
Description: Battlecry: The next Murloc you play this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
Lore: Pretty harmless unless you're a Seadevil.

Name: Second-Rate Bruiser
Description: Taunt. Costs (2) less if your opponent has at least three minions.
Lore: He'll be a first-rate bruiser once he gets used to his contacts.

Name: Shadow Sensei
Description: Battlecry: Give a Stealth minion +2/+2.
Lore: He used to be Aya's tutor, but she fired him for bugging her too much.

Name: Small-Time Buccaneer
Description: Has +2 Attack while you have a weapon equipped.
Lore: "Oh, I'm not serious about it. I only pirate on the weekends."

Name: Greater Arcane Missiles
Description: Shoot three missiles at random enemies that deal 3 damage each.
Lore: Wow, and I thought Arcane Missiles was great!

Name: Kabal Trafficker
Description: At the end of your turn, add a random Demon to your hand.
Lore: She ships illicit mana crystals around the world in packages marked: FUNNEL CAKE.

Name: Bittertide Hydra
Description: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 3 damage to your hero.
Lore: It's actually only the middle head that's bitter. The others are sweet and spicy.

Name: Awaken the Makers
Description: Quest: Summon 7 Deathrattle minions.Reward: Amara, Warden of Hope.
Lore: They keep hitting the Snooze button.

Name: Swamp King Dred
Description: After your opponent plays a minion, attack it.
Lore: Swamp King Dred, more like Swamp King Dead, amiright?

Name: Hired Gun
Description: Taunt
Lore: He loves his job and would do it for free! (But don't tell his boss!)

Name: Hozen Healer
Description: Battlecry: Restore a minion to full Health.
Lore: He didn't go to school for healing, but we keep losing all the good healers to Ratchet, so I guess we'll take him.

Name: I Know a Guy
Description: Discover a Taunt minion.
Lore: Well… a guy who knows a guy.

Name: Jade Behemoth
Description: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem.
Lore: I think we should talk about the jade elephant in the room.

Name: Fireguard Destroyer
Description: Battlecry: Gain 1-4 Attack. Overload: (1)
Lore: Ragnaros interviews hundreds of Fire Elementals for the position of "Destroyer" but very few have what it takes.

Name: Hot Spring Guardian
Description: TauntBattlecry: Restore3 Health.
Lore: NONE SHALL PASS until at least an hour after eating.

Name: Hydrologist
Description: Battlecry: Discover a Secret.
Lore: Murloc hydrologists are pretty rare. Most murloc undergrads pick computer science.

Name: Blazecaller
Description: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 5 damage.
Lore: For when a flamecaller just won't do.

Name: Bloodbloom
Description: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
Lore: Help save mana. Donate blood today!

Name: Gluttonous Ooze
Description: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and gain Armor equal to its Attack.
Lore: Three time winner of the Un'Goro weapon eating contest.

Name: Vilespine Slayer
Description: Combo: Destroy a minion.
Lore: 'Cause slayers gonna slay, slay, slay, slay, slay.

Name: Ozruk
Description: TauntBattlecry: Gain +5 Health for each Elemental you played last turn.
Lore: Between you and me, Ozruk is a bit obsessed with his body.

Name: Bluegill Warrior
Description: Charge
Lore: He just wants a hug.   A sloppy... slimy... hug.

Name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
Description: Taunt
Lore: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

Name: Boulderfist Ogre
Description: N/A
Lore: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

Name: Charge
Description: Give a friendly minion Charge. It can't attack heroes this turn.
Lore: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

Name: Chillwind Yeti
Description: N/A
Lore: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

Name: Guardian of Kings
Description: Battlecry: Restore 6 Health to your hero.
Lore: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

Name: Gurubashi Berserker
Description: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3 Attack.
Lore: No Pain, No Gain.

Name: Hammer of Wrath
Description: Deal 3 damage.  Draw a card.
Lore: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

Name: Hand of Protection
Description: Give a minion Divine Shield.
Lore: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

Name: Shadow Word: Pain
Description: Destroy a minion with 3 or less Attack.
Lore: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning  acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

Name: Shattered Sun Cleric
Description: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1/+1.
Lore: They always have a spare flask of Sunwell Energy Drink™!

Name: Shield Block
Description: Gain 5 Armor.  Draw a card.
Lore: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

Name: Shiv
Description: Deal 1 damage. Draw a card.
Lore: Rogues are experts at SHIV-al-ry.

Name: Kel'Thuzad
Description: At the end of each turn, summon all friendly minions that died this turn.
Lore: Kel'Thuzad could not resist the call of the Lich King.   Even when it's just a robo-call extolling the Lich King's virtues.

Name: Loatheb
Description: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
Lore: Loatheb used to be a simple Bog Beast.  This is why we need stricter regulations on mining and agriculture.

Name: Fight Promoter
Description: Battlecry: If you control a minion with 6 or more Health, draw two cards.
Lore: "Yeah, I can get you Knuckles. No, no, he's been clean for *weeks*."

Name: Finders Keepers
Description: Discover a card with Overload. Overload: (1)
Lore: INFINITE LOOP!

Name: Flamewaker
Description: After you cast a spell, deal 2 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Lore: Flamewakers HATE being confused for Flamewalkers. They just wake up fire, they don’t walk on it. Walking on fire is CRAZY.

Name: Tortollan Primalist
Description: Battlecry: Discover a spell and cast it with random targets.
Lore: I see pizza in my future.

Name: Lakkari Sacrifice
Description: Quest: Discard 6 cards.Reward: Nether Portal.
Lore: They asked, “And what must we give in return?” Gul’dan lowered his hood and answered: “Six… cards…”

Name: Chillmaw
Description: TauntDeathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all minions.
Lore: Chillmaw keeps trying to ruin the Grand Tournament, and she would've done it too, if it weren't for those dang kids!

Name: Confessor Paletress
Description: Inspire: Summon a random Legendary minion.
Lore: She sees into your past and makes you face your fears.  Most common fear:  Getting Majordomo out of Sneed's Old Shredder.

Name: Fjola Lightbane
Description: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain Divine Shield.
Lore: LOVES being called "the wonder twins".

Name: Gormok the Impaler
Description: Battlecry: If you have at least 4 other minions, deal 4 damage.
Lore: Gormok has been giving impaling lessons in a small tent near the tournament grounds.  For only 25g you too could learn the fine art of impaling!

Name: Icehowl
Description: ChargeCan't attack heroes.
Lore: This massive yeti just closes his eyes and charges at the nearest target.  The nearest Target is a couple blocks away and has sick deals on skateboards.

Name: Lightwarden
Description: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
Lore: She’s smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.

Name: Lightwell
Description: At the start of your turn, restore 3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
Lore: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

Name: Hogger
Description: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
Lore: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

Name: Illidan Stormrage
Description: Whenever you play a card, summon a 2/1 Flame of Azzinoth.
Lore: Illidan's brother, Malfurion, imprisoned him beneath Hyjal for 10,000 years.  Stormrages are not good at letting go of grudges.

Name: King of Beasts
Description: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each other Beast you have.
Lore: He never sleeps.  Not even in the mighty jungle.

Name: Light of the Naaru
Description: Restore 3 Health. If the target is still damaged, summon a Lightwarden.
Lore: "Light it up!" - Command given to both Lightwardens and Goblins holding Flamecannons.

Name: Lil' Exorcist
Description:
Taunt
Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each enemy Deathrattle minion.
Lore: Warlocks have the town exorcist on speed dial in case they unleash the wrong demon.

Name: Madder Bomber
Description: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split between all other characters.
Lore: Dang, Bomber, calm down.

Name: Mech-Bear-Cat
Description: Whenever this minion takes damage, add a Spare Part card to your hand.
Lore: Crushes buildings with his BEAR hands.

Name: Kor'kron Elite
Description: Charge
Lore: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

Name: Light's Justice
Description: N/A
Lore: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

Name: Lord of the Arena
Description: Taunt
Lore: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

Name: Burgly Bully
Description: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, add a Coin to your hand.
Lore: He only burgles to pay the bills. He is really just a bully at heart.

Name: Defias Cleaner
Description: Battlecry: Silence a minion with Deathrattle.
Lore: His house cleaning service is quite thorough. Not a spot to be found... or any of your stuff!

Name: Dirty Rat
Description: TauntBattlecry: Your opponent summons a random minion from their hand.
Lore: It's not his fault… Someone keeps stealing his soap!

Name: Gang Up
Description: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 copies of it into your deck.
Lore: If you are thinking about visiting Moonbrook, you better roll deep.

Name: Hungry Dragon
Description: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for your opponent.
Lore: Hungry Hungry Dragon is NOT a fun game.

Name: Igneous Elemental
Description: Deathrattle: Add two 1/2 Elementals to your hand.
Lore: We wanted to name him "Ingenious Elemental", but he just wasn't that bright.

Name: Iron Hide
Description: Gain 5 Armor.
Lore: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

Name: Tidal Surge
Description: Deal 4 damage to a minion. Restore 4 Health to your hero.
Lore: Also good for removing pesky stains.

Name: Tortollan Forager
Description: Battlecry: Add a random minion with 5 or more Attack to your hand.
Lore: In the Tortollan tongue, Un’goro is known as the “Land of the Lost and Found.”

Name: Golakka Crawler
Description: Battlecry: Destroy a Pirate and gain +1/+1.
Lore: Universally adored by both control decks and ninjas.

Name: Sudden Genesis
Description: Summon copies of your damaged minions.
Lore: Being hurt can make you another person.

Name: Open the Waygate
Description: Quest: Cast 6 spells that didn't start in your deck.Reward: Time Warp.
Lore: Although powerful, the incantation is simple. It’s just a jump to the left, and then a step to the right.

Name: Bloodthistle Toxin
Description: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.

Name: Briarthorn Toxin
Description: Give a minion +3 Attack.

Name: Faceless Destroyer
Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Name: Totemic Slam
Description: Hero PowerSummon a Totem of your choice.

Name: War Kodo
Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Name: Golden Monkey
Description: TauntBattlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.

Name: AI Buddy - Destroy Minions
Description: Spawn into play to destroy all minions.

Name: AI Buddy - No Deck/Hand
Description: Spawn into play to destroy the AI's Hand and Deck.

Name: AI Helper Buddy
Description: Get the AI ready for testing.

Name: Crash the server
Description: Crash the server

Name: Damage 1
Description: Deal 1 damage.

Name: Set Health to 1
Description: Set a character's health to 1, and remove all armour.

Name: Treant
Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Name: Jade Golem
Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Name: Druid of the Flame
Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Name: Thunder Bluff Valiant
Description: Inspire: Give your Totems +2 Attack.
Lore: Allowing totems to attack is not cheating.  I mean, there isn't anything in the rule books about it.

Name: Steward of Darkshire
Description: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it Divine Shield.
Lore: Turns out divine shields are way cheaper if you buy in bulk.

Name: Thing from Below
Description: Taunt. Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
Lore: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

Name: DOOM!
Description: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.
Lore: We ran out of space for "DOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"

Name: Darkspeaker
Description: Battlecry: Swap stats with a friendly minion.
Lore: People often think that Darkspeaker is the arch nemesis of Lightspeaker, but that title actually belongs to Heavyspeaker.

Name: Embrace the Shadow
Description: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
Lore: For when your Auchenai Soulpriests call in sick.

Name: Venture Co. Mercenary
Description: Your minions cost (3) more.
Lore: No Job is too big.  No fee is too big.

Name: Windfury Harpy
Description: Windfury
Lore: Harpies are not pleasant sounding.  That's the nicest I can put it.

Name: Wisp
Description: N/A
Lore: If you hit an Eredar Lord with enough Wisps, it will explode.   But why?

Name: Worgen Infiltrator
Description: Stealth
Lore: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

Name: Wrath
Description: Choose One - Deal 3 damage to a minion; or 1 damage and draw a card.
Lore: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

Name: Young Dragonhawk
Description: Windfury
Lore: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.

Name: Youthful Brewmaster
Description: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
Lore: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews.   Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!

Name: Abomination
Description: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to ALL characters.
Lore: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

Name: Alarm-o-Bot
Description: At the start of your turn, swap this minion with a random one in your hand.
Lore: WARNING.  WARNING.  WARNING.

Name: Aldor Peacekeeper
Description: Battlecry: Change an enemy minion's Attack to 1.
Lore: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

Name: Ancestral Spirit
Description: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
Lore: It was just a flesh wound.

Name: Ancient Mage
Description: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Spell Damage +1.
Lore: Sometimes he forgets and just wanders into someone else's game.

Name: Mindgames
Description: Put a copy of a random minion from your opponent's deck into the battlefield.
Lore: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

Name: Molten Giant
Description: Costs (1) less for each damage your hero has taken.
Lore: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

Name: Mountain Giant
Description: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
Lore: His mother said that he was just big boned.

Name: Murloc Warleader
Description: Your other Murlocs have +2/+1.
Lore: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound?  Nope!  Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

Name: Patient Assassin
Description: StealthPoisonous
Lore: He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

Name: Pit Lord
Description: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
Lore: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

Name: Arcane Missiles
Description: Deal 3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Lore: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

Name: Arcane Shot
Description: Deal 2 damage.
Lore: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

Name: Arcanite Reaper
Description: N/A
Lore: No… actually you should fear the Reaper.

Name: Savage Roar
Description: Give your characters +2 Attack this turn.
Lore: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.

Name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
Description: Taunt
Lore: Sen'jin Villiage is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

Name: Shadow Bolt
Description: Deal 4 damage to a minion.
Lore: It’s a Bolt.   Its made out of Shadow.   What more do you need to know!

Name: Shadow Word: Death
Description: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 5 or more.
Lore: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

Name: Greater Healing Potion
Description: Restore 12 health to a friendly character.
Lore: Filled with electrolytes!

Name: Grimestreet Enforcer
Description: At the end of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
Lore: "Sir, you don't have a permit to park your mount here."

Name: Grimestreet Informant
Description: Battlecry: Discover a Hunter, Paladin or Warrior card.
Lore: "Naw, naw. You're talkin' about Grime BOULEVARD. I ain't know nuthin' 'bout that."

Name: Grimestreet Pawnbroker
Description: Battlecry: Give a random weapon in your hand +1/+1.

Description: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon two 2/3 Elementals with Taunt.

Name: Kalimos, Primal Lord
Description: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, cast an Elemental Invocation.
Lore: All that's missing is a little heart.

Lore: You no take tentacle!

Name: Faceless Behemoth
Description: N/A

Description: Battlecry: Summon a random 3-Cost minion.
Lore: They never get the recognition they deserve.

Lore: Let's be honest. One option is a lot ragier than the other.

Name: Alexstrasza's Champion
Description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Charge.
Lore: "Put more spikes on her.  No, more spikes.  What part of 'more spikes' do you not understand?  MORE SPIKES!" - Alexstrasza

Name: Argent Lance
Description: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, +1 Durability.
Lore: The stripes make it look like a candy cane, but we recommend against licking it.

Name: Argent Watchman
Description:
Can't attack.
Inspire: Can attack as normal this turn.
Lore: Who argent watches the Argent Watchman?

Name: Armored Warhorse
Description: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Charge.
Lore: Yep.  It's a horse... wearing armor... going to war.

Name: Ball of Spiders
Description: Summon three 1/1 Webspinners.
Lore: "THEY'RE EVERYWHERE GET THEM OFF!!!" - Everyone

Name: Burgle
Description: Add 2 random class cards to your hand (from your opponent's class).
Lore: Yoink!

Name: Master Jouster
Description: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
Lore: Needs just a few more ratings points to become Grandmaster Jouster.

Name: Mogor's Champion
Description: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Lore: This champion has learned from the best.  Except for his target selection.

Name: Polymorph: Boar
Description: Transform a minion into a 4/2 Boar with Charge.
Lore: It's always Huffer.

Name: Powershot
Description: Deal 2 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
Lore: pow POW pow

Name: Ram Wrangler
Description: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, summon a random Beast.
Lore: Not getting trampled is really the trick here.

Name: Poisoned Blade
Description: Your Hero Power gives this weapon +1 Attack instead of replacing it.
Lore: How much more poisoned can a blade get?  The answer is a lot.  A lot more poisoned.

Name: Recruiter
Description: Inspire: Add a 2/2 Squire to your hand.
Lore: Join the Argent Crusade!  We have attractive tabards and you get to carry really nice swords!

Name: Sea Reaver
Description: When you draw this, deal 1 damage to your minions.
Lore: A little better than Sea Minus Reaver.

Name: Explosive Shot
Description: Deal 5 damage to a minion and 2 damage to adjacent ones.
Lore: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

Name: Sunwalker
Description: Taunt. Divine Shield
Lore: She doesn’t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It's just a name.  Don’t worry!

Name: Twilight Drake
Description: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
Lore: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy.  And Tacos.

Name: Upgrade!
Description: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1.  Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.
Lore: Easily worth 50 DKP.

Name: Vaporize
Description: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
Lore: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card.  We may never know the truth.

Name: Violet Teacher
Description: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
Lore: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig.  And then you get your name on the board.

Name: Jungle Moonkin
Description:
Both players have
Spell Damage +2.
Lore: The REAL angry chicken!

Name: Reliquary Seeker
Description: Battlecry: If you have 6 other minions, gain +4/+4.
Lore: The Reliquary considers itself the equal of the League of Explorers.  The League of Explorers doesn't.

Name: Summoning Stone
Description: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random minion of the same Cost.
Lore: Sometimes it feels like it's always the same slackers that are waiting for a summon.

Name: Unearthed Raptor
Description: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Gain a copy of its Deathrattle.
Lore: Still hunting for the ones who earthed him.

Name: Wobbling Runts
Description: Deathrattle: Summon three 2/2 Runts.
Lore: The fourth one fell off in a tragic accident.  They don't talk about it.

Name: Dread Infernal
Description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
Lore: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

Name: Kabal Songstealer
Description: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
Lore: Gadgetzan Writer’s Award goes to the player who writes the most compelling fanfic about why this Arrakoa has a golden frog in his hand!

Name: Kabal Talonpriest
Description: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
Lore: Inkmaster Solia had to figure out how to tatoo feathers.

Name: Kooky Chemist
Description: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
Lore: #abs

Name: Spiked Hogrider
Description: Battlecry: If an enemy minion has Taunt, gain Charge.
Lore: Did you know the Hogchoppers compete every year at the Mirage Raceway? They do. It's a real group.

Name: Stolen Goods
Description: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +3/+3.
Lore: It fell off a kodo, I promise!

Name: Raza the Chained
Description: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, your Hero Power costs (0) this game.
Lore: "Could you do me a favor and get the keys from Kazakus?"

Name: Sergeant Sally
Description: Deathrattle: Deal damage equal to the minion's Attack to all enemy minions.
Lore: "Who is she? Where did she come from? We don't even have a police force here in Gadgetzan!!" - Mayor Noggenfogger

Name: Servant of Kalimos
Description: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, Discover an Elemental.
Lore: He's doing his best, but his mom thinks that if he had just applied himself in school Kalimos would be working for HIM.

Name: Shellshifter
Description: Choose One - Transform into a 5/3 with Stealth;or a 3/5 with Taunt.
Lore: Master of the Three Shell Monte.

Name: Chittering Tunneler
Description: Battlecry: Discover a spell.Deal damage to your hero equal to its Cost.
Lore: Ear to the ground, he carefully interpreted the chittering noises: “You wanna cast a spell? I wanna cast a spell!”

Name: Stampede
Description: Each time you play a Beast this turn,add a random Beast to your hand.
Lore: Many hunters long for the pitter-patter of enormous feet.

Name: Jungle Giants
Description: Quest: Summon 5 minions with 5 or more attack.Reward: Barnabus.
Lore: Forming the Golakka Crater was the end of Barnabus' disastrous career as a dancer.

Name: Darkshire Councilman
Description: After you summon a minion, gain +1 Attack.
Lore: Democracy in action!

Name: Divine Strength
Description: Give a minion +1/+2.
Lore: Every year a few paladins get disqualified from the Westfall weight lifting championship for using Divine Strength.

Name: Duskboar
Description: N/A
Lore: Often excluded from dinner parties. To be fair, he is very boaring.

Name: Eldritch Horror
Description: N/A
Lore: Often wonders what path his life might have taken if he wasn't named, you know, "Eldritch Horror".

Name: Maiden of the Lake
Description: Your Hero Power costs (1).
Lore: Not a good basis for a system of government.

Name: Mukla's Champion
Description: Inspire: Give your other minions +1/+1.
Lore: An elegant gorilla, for a more civilized age.

Name: Murloc Knight
Description: Inspire: Summon a random Murloc.
Lore: Hee hee!  Look at his cute little feet.

Name: Silence
Description: Silence a minion.
Lore: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

Name: Silver Hand Knight
Description: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Squire.
Lore: It's good to be a knight.   Less so to be one's squire.

Name: Magnataur Alpha
Description: Also damages the minions next to whomever he attacks.
Lore: Playing him also gets you into the Magnataur Beta.

Name: Master of Ceremonies
Description: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Spell Damage, gain +2/+2.
Lore: Goes by "MC ElfyElf".

Name: Mulch
Description: Destroy a minion.Add a random minion to your opponent's hand.
Lore: Is this a noun or a verb?  We will never know.

Name: Mysterious Challenger
Description: Battlecry: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
Lore: He may sound surly and antisocial, but he's actually just really shy.

Name: Master of Disguise
Description: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.
Lore: She's actually a male tauren.  People don't call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

Name: Obsidian Destroyer
Description: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
Lore: No obsidian is safe around the Obsidian Destroyer!

Name: Pit Snake
Description: Poisonous
Lore: It could be worse.  It could be a Snake Pit.

Name: Raven Idol
Description:
Choose One -
Discover a minion; or Discover a spell.
Lore: Was petrified when it found out it didn't make the cut for Azerothian Idol.

Name: Rumbling Elemental
Description: After you play a Battlecry minion, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
Lore: He's a very hungry elemental.

Name: Quartermaster
Description: Battlecry: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2.
Lore: His specialty? Dividing things into four pieces.

Name: Windspeaker
Description: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Windfury.
Lore: Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

Name: Wolfrider
Description: Charge
Lore: Orcish raiders ride wolves because they are well adapted to harsh environments, and because they are soft and cuddly.

Name: Anub'ar Ambusher
Description: Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand.
Lore: Originally he was called "Anub'ar Guy who bounces a guy back to your hand", but it lacked a certain zing.

Name: Avenge
Description: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
Lore: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force."  Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.

Name: Drakonid Operative
Description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a card in your opponent's deck.
Lore: His job is to spy on the Goons and the Jade Lotus, but he's OBVIOUSLY a dragon so it's pretty hard work.

Name: Brass Knuckles
Description: After your hero attacks, give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
Lore: For the goon that wants to make a fashion statement.

Name: Volcanic Drake
Description: Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Lore: Volcanic Drakes breathe lava instead of fire. The antacid vendor at Thorium Point does a brisk business with them.

Name: Core Rager
Description: Battlecry: If your hand is empty, gain +3/+3.
Lore: It takes a special kind of hunter to venture deep into a firey lava pit and convince a monster who lives there to come home and be a cuddly housepet.

Name: Jeweled Macaw
Description: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
Lore: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

Name: Lakkari Felhound
Description: TauntBattlecry: Discard two random cards.
Lore: Guaranteed to track tar all over your carpet.

Name: Primalfin Totem
Description: At the end of your turn,summon a 1/1 Murloc.
Lore: Emits a sound only murlocs can hear, which is good because it’s REALLY annoying.

Name: Raptor Hatchling
Description: Deathrattle: Shuffle a 4/3 Raptor into your deck.
Lore: They’re just baby teeth. Lots and lots of baby teeth.

Name: Curious Glimmerroot
Description: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards.Guess which one started in your opponent's deck to get a copy of it.
Lore: George promised to be good. But it's easy for little Glimmerroots to forget.

Name: Spirit Echo
Description: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Return this to your hand."
Lore: I guess you can say they’re… “soul survivors.”

Name: Spiritsinger Umbra
Description: After you summon a minion, trigger its Deathrattle effect.
Lore: She sees the fate of anyone she meets, but it's always the same: dinosaur attack.

Name: Mind Shatter
Description: Hero Power  Deal 3 damage.

Name: Mind Spike
Description: Hero Power Deal 2 damage.

Name: Nightmare
Description: Give a minion +5/+5.  At the start of your next turn, destroy it.

Description: N/A

Description: Whenever a player summons a minion, destroy it.

Name: Destroy Played Cards
Description: Whenever a player summons a minion, destroy it.

Name: The Song That Ends the World
Description: Crash the game server.  No, really.
Lore: Some men just want to watch the world burn.

Name: Yogg-Saron Test (Auto)
Description: Battlecry: Cast 30 random spells. (targets chosen randomly).

Name: Stand Against Darkness
Description: Summon five 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
Lore: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.

Name: Nat, the Darkfisher
Description: At the start of your opponent's turn, they have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
Lore: You can take away his humanity, but you will never take away his fishing pole.

Name: Princess Huhuran

Lore: She flitters around Ahn'Qiraj dreaming of the day she will meet a sweet prince, whom she can lay thousands of eggs with.

Name: Ragnaros, Lightlord
Description: At the end of your turn, restore 8 health to a damaged friendly character.
Lore: What happens when you try and corrupt a corrupted firelord? DOUBLE NEGATIVE, INSECT!

Name: Shifter Zerus
Description: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a different minion.
Lore: It's like being able to play with THREE angry chickens!

Name: Soggoth the Slitherer
Description: TauntCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Lore: Don't tell Soggoth, but in the future he gets totally owned by the Master's Glaive and his skull becomes a tourist attraction.

Name: Floating Watcher
Description: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, gain +2/+2.
Lore: "Evil Eye Watcher of Doom" was the original name, but marketing felt it was a bit too aggressive.

Name: Flying Machine
Description: Windfury
Lore: To operate, this contraption needs a hula doll on the dashboard. Otherwise it's just a “falling machine.”

Name: Force-Tank MAX
Description: Divine Shield
Lore: There is a factory in Tanaris for crafting force-tanks, but it only ever made two, because of cost overruns.

Name: Gilblin Stalker
Description: Stealth
Lore:
"Shhh, I think I hear something."
"Ah, it's probably nothing." - Every Henchman

Name: Glaivezooka
Description: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion +1 Attack.
Lore: For the times when a regular bazooka just isn't enough.

Name: Gnomeregan Infantry
Description:
Charge
Taunt
Lore: The gnomes are valiant and ready to return to their irradiated, poorly ventilated homeland!

Name: Goblin Auto-Barber
Description: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
Lore: This guy is excellent at adjusting your haircut and/or height.

Name: Lost Tallstrider
Description: N/A
Lore: The message, "If found, please return to Mulgore," is tattooed on his rear.

Name: Claw
Description: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn and 2 Armor.
Lore: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

Name: Cleave
Description: Deal 2 damage to two random enemy minions.
Lore: Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

Name: Bright-Eyed Scout
Description: Battlecry: Draw a card. Change its Cost to (5).
Lore: Also inordinately excited for cupcakes.

Name: Shadow Visions
Description: Discover a copy of a spell in your deck.
Lore: This one’s a bird. And here’s a bunny!

Name: The Last Kaleidosaur
Description: Quest: Cast 6 spells on your minions. Reward: Galvadon.
Lore: “Impossible!” exclaimed the Silver Hand Recruit, his eyes filled with fear. Uther shook his head, turning the crystal until it caught the light: “Life finds a way.”

Name: Blingtron 3000
Description: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon for each player.
Lore: PREPARE PARTY SERVOS FOR IMMEDIATE DEPLOYMENT.

Name: Murloc Raider
Description: N/A
Lore: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

Name: Murloc Tidehunter
Description: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Murloc Scout.
Lore: "Death will rise, from the tides!"

Name: Nightblade
Description: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
Lore: Your face is the place you'd probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

Name: Northshire Cleric
Description: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
Lore: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

Name: Daring Reporter
Description: Whenever your opponent draws a card, gain +1/+1.
Lore: She's working on a story! While skydiving!

Name: Leatherclad Hogleader
Description: Battlecry: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand, gain Charge.
Lore: The Hogchoppers, the terrors of Tanaris, can always be found at one tavern or another in Gadgetzan, refueling for totally real and legit adventures that they go on.

Name: Tol'vir Stoneshaper
Description: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
Lore: He spends a lot of time keeping himself in stoneshape.

Name: Dinomancy
Description: Your Hero Power becomes 'Give a Beast +2/+2'
Lore: Anyone can dinomance. Just put your lips together and RAAWWWAARGGGH.

Name: Primordial Glyph
Description: Discover a spell.Reduce its Cost by (2).
Lore: It's the Ancient Tol'vir symbol for "Whoops!"

Name: Hemet, Jungle Hunter
Description: Battlecry: Destroy all cards in your deck that cost (3) or less.
Lore: The goblin travel agency lost his luggage, but he's still having a great vacation!

Name: Divine Spirit
Description: Double a minion's Health.
Lore: Double the trouble. Double the fun!

Name: Dragonling Mechanic
Description: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Mechanical Dragonling.
Lore: She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

Name: Drain Life
Description: Deal 2 damage. Restore 2 Health to your hero.
Lore: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

Name: Smuggler's Crate
Description: Give a random Beast in your hand +2/+2.
Lore: Are you sure these are the crates that are supposed to go to the Gadgetzan petting zoo?

Name: Smuggler's Run
Description: All minions in your hand gain +1/+1.
Lore: One of the most famous busts in Gadgetzan’s history happened on Smuggler’s Run, where Sergeant Sally apprehended a cadre of Grimy Goons transporting a massive number of illegal fish heads.

Name: Street Trickster
Description: Spell Damage +1
Lore: His first trick: making your wallet disappear!

Name: Streetwise Investigator
Description: Battlecry: Enemy minions lose Stealth.
Lore: "Hmmmm… Call it a hunch, but I'm starting to think that there may be some kind of criminal activity going on in Gadgetzan."

Name: Rat Pack
Description: Deathrattle: Summon a number of 1/1 Rats equal to this minion's Attack.
Lore: He's gonna do it his way.

Name: Sleep with the Fishes
Description: Deal 3 damage to all damaged minions.
Lore: If you're sleeping with the fishes, we highly suggest not bringing an electric blanket.

Name: Dark Iron Skulker
Description: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all undamaged enemy minions.
Lore: He loves skulking. He skulks after hours just for the joy of it, but his friends are pretty worried he'll get burnt out.

Name: Tyrantus
Description: Can't be targeted by Spells or Hero Powers.
Lore: Millennia of evolutionary pressures turned his species into the Faerie Dragons we know today.

Name: Fadeleaf Toxin
Description: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.

Name: Firebloom Toxin
Description: Deal 2 damage.

Name: Gnoll
Description: Taunt

Name: Grumbly Runt
Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Name: Destroy All Heroes
Description: Destroy all heroes.

Name: Destroy All Minions
Description: Destroy all minions.

Name: Nerubian
Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Name: Jade Golem
Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Name: Rock Elemental
Description: Taunt

Name: Primal Fusion
Description: Give a minion +1/+1 for each of your Totems.
Lore: Golce and Dabbana have a new line of Earth Totems available at vendors everywhere this holiday season.

Name: Psych-o-Tron
Description: Taunt  Divine Shield
Lore: "Annoyinger-o-Tron" was just too unwieldy. And accurate.

Name: Ravaging Ghoul
Description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
Lore: But goes by "Ravishing Ghoul" when he hits the club.

Name: Shadow Strike
Description: Deal 5 damage to an undamaged character.
Lore: It's like a backstab, only from the front. And with two more stabs.

Name: Shatter
Description: Destroy a Frozen minion.
Lore: What's cooler than being cool?

Name: Southsea Squidface
Description: Deathrattle: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
Lore: Quick! Before I drown! Let me sharpen your sword for you.

Name: Spawn of N'Zoth
Description: Deathrattle: Give your minions +1/+1.
Lore: Who's a cute widdle N'Zoth? You are! Yes you are! Yes you're the cutest widdle N'Zoth in the whole world!!!

Name: Squirming Tentacle
Description: Taunt
Lore: Yeah, I think we can agree that killing the squirming tentacle first is a good idea.

Name: Thistle Tea
Description: Draw a card. Add 2 extra copies of it to your hand.
Lore: Aren't Thistles prickly? Why would you drink them? I don't get Rogues.

Name: Twilight Darkmender
Description: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, restore 10 Health to your hero.
Lore: First she separates them from the lights, washes them in cold water, and hang-dries.

Name: Undercity Huckster
Description: Deathrattle: Add a random class card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
Lore: Psst! Wanna buy a random class card (from your opponent's class)?

Name: Ancient Harbinger
Description: At the start of your turn, put a 10-Cost minion from your deck into your hand.
Lore: "honey, can u run down to the store and pick up some 10 cost minions? thx"

Name: Blade of C'Thun
Description: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Add its Attack and Health to C'Thun's (wherever it is).
Lore: C'Thun demands a sacrifice! Preferably a Deathwing.

Name: Evil Heckler
Description: Taunt
Lore: To be honest, heckling is not the most effective form of evil.

Name: Fearsome Doomguard
Description: N/A
Lore: They were originally called Cuddleguards, but they were not inspiring the proper amount of fear.

Name: Twilight Guardian
Description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
Lore: A result of magical experiments carried out by the Black Dragonflight, it's not his fault that he's a vicious killer.

Name: Power Word: Glory
Description: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, restore 4 Health to your hero.
Lore: The promise of glory is a powerful tool to get minions to do your bidding.  Only slightly less powerful than the promise of an ice cream bar!

Name: Refreshment Vendor
Description: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health to each hero.
Lore: Menu:  Funnel cakes, carrots, popcorn, jormungar steaks.  It's hard serving a diverse clientele.

Name: Southsea Deckhand
Description: Has Charge while you have a weapon equipped.
Lore: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

Name: Felguard
Description: Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
Lore: Yes, he'll fight for you.  BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

Name: Feral Spirit
Description: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. Overload: (2)
Lore: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

Name: Flare
Description: All minions lose Stealth. Destroy all enemy Secrets. Draw a card.
Lore: Not only does it reveal your enemies, but it's also great for parties!

Name: Frothing Berserker
Description: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
Lore: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

Name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
Description: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
Lore: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

Name: Headcrack
Description: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero. Combo: Return this to your hand next turn.
Lore: When all else fails, nothing beats a swift whack upside the head.

Name: Holy Fire
Description: Deal 5 damage.  Restore 5 Health to your hero.
Lore: Often followed by Holy Smokes!

Name: Brann Bronzebeard
Description: Your Battlecries trigger twice.
Lore: Contains 75% more fiber than his brother Magni!

Name: Elise Starseeker
Description: Battlecry: Shuffle the 'Map to the Golden Monkey'   into your deck.
Lore: A large part of her job entails not mixing up the Map to the Golden Monkey with the Map to Monkey Island.

Name: Reno Jackson
Description: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, fully heal your hero.
Lore: Reno is a four-time winner of the 'Best Accessorized Explorer' award.

Lore: A Tortollan gardener's worst nightmare.

Description: Battlecry: Copy your opponent's Hero Power.
Lore: Hey!  Let me try that...

Name: Stablemaster
Description: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast Immune this turn.
Lore: Takes way better care of her pets than her brother, Unstablemaster.

Name: Competitive Spirit
Description: Secret: When your turn starts, give your minions +1/+1.
Lore: Competition can be an inspiration to improve oneself.  Or kill all the competitors.

Name: Convert
Description: Put a copy of an enemy minion into your hand.
Lore: "Are you interested in... HEALTH benefits?!"

Name: Cutpurse
Description: Whenever this minion attacks a hero, add the Coin to your hand.
Lore: He has a giant collection of purses now.  One for every outfit!

Name: Darnassus Aspirant
Description:
Battlecry: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
Deathrattle: Lose a Mana Crystal.
Lore: She loves mana crystals, she hates mana crystals.   So fickle!

Name: Abusive Sergeant
Description: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
Lore: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!

Name: Coldlight Seer
Description: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +2 Health.
Lore: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths.  So no, there's no getting away from murlocs.

Name: Ancient of War
Description: Choose One - +5 Attack; or +5 Health and Taunt.
Lore: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?"  You lose if you get crushed to death.

Name: Lorewalker Cho
Description: Whenever a player casts a spell, put a copy into the other player's hand.
Lore: Lorewalker Cho archives and shares tales from the land of Pandaria, but his favorite story is the one where Joey and Phoebe go on a road trip.

Name: Malygos
Description: Spell Damage +5
Lore: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic.  He gets so mad!

Name: Millhouse Manastorm
Description: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (0) next turn.
Lore: "I'm gonna light you up, sweetcheeks!"

Name: Nat Pagle
Description: At the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
Lore: Nat Pagle, Azeroth's premier fisherman!  He invented the Auto-Angler 3000, the Extendo-Pole 3000, and the Lure-o-matic 2099 (still in testing).

Name: Nozdormu
Description: Players only have 15 seconds to take their turns.
Lore: Time to write some flavor text.

Name: Lightbomb
Description: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
Lore: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

Name: Mini-Mage
Description:
Stealth
Spell Damage +1
Lore: He is sometimes found hiding in the treasure chest in the Gurubashi Arena.

Name: Piloted Sky Golem
Description: Deathrattle: Summon a random 4-Cost minion.
Lore: The pinnacle of goblin engineering. Includes an espresso machine and foot massager.

Name: Deathlord
Description: Taunt. Deathrattle: Your opponent puts a minion from their deck into the battlefield.
Lore: "Rise from your grave!" - Kel'Thuzad

Name: Nerubian Egg
Description: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
Lore: Eggs are a good source of protein and Nerubians.

Name: Sludge Belcher
Description:
Taunt.
Deathrattle: Summon a 1/2 Slime with Taunt.
Lore: DO NOT GIVE HIM A ROOT BEER.

Name: Wailing Soul
Description: Battlecry: Silence your other minions.
Lore: This soul just wails on you. Dang, soul, let up already.

Name: Backroom Bouncer
Description: Whenever a friendly minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
Lore: "WHY ARE YOU IN THE BACK ROOM? WHO IS WATCHING THE FRONT?!"

Name: Bloodfury Potion
Description: Give a minion +3 Attack. If it's a Demon, also give it +3 Health.
Lore: You know what really makes my blood boil? The skyrocketing price of Bloodfury potions!

Name: Bomb Squad
Description: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to an enemy minion. Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
Lore: Please don't explode! Please don't explode! Please don't explode!

Name: Celestial Dreamer
Description: Battlecry: If you control a minion with 5 or more Attack, gain +2/+2.
Lore: If you think her job is easy, YOU try falling asleep on cue.

Name: Lunar Visions
Description: Draw 2 cards. Minions drawn costs (2) less.
Lore: The true mystery of lunar visions is how there is nothing to watch when there are so many channels.

Name: Mana Geode
Description: Whenever this minion is healed, summon a 2/2 Crystal.
Lore: Gadgetzan, where even the pet rocks have pet rocks.

Name: Manic Soulcaster
Description: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Shuffle a copy into your deck.
Lore: When casting a tournament, you really have to put your soul into it!

Name: Meanstreet Marshal
Description: Deathrattle: If this minion has 2 or more Attack, draw a card.
Lore: Remember, submit your bribes directly to the Marshal - it's the law!

Name: Resurrect
Description: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game.
Lore: I walked into the dungeon and noticed a slain adventurer. In his final moments, he had scrawled out a message in the dust on the wall beside him. Two words: "rez plz"

Name: Revenge
Description: Deal 1 damage to all minions. If you have 12 or less Health, deal 3 damage instead.
Lore: This is better than Arcane Explosion, so I guess warriors are finally getting revenge on mages for Mortal Strike being worse than Fireball.

Name: Eggnapper
Description: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Raptors.
Lore: Often misunderstood, it's just that he likes to use the eggs as pillows.

Name: Ornery Direhorn
Description: TauntBattlecry: Adapt.
Lore: "It's an herbivore. How dangerous can it be?" - Famous last words

Name: Primalfin Lookout
Description: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, Discover a Murloc.
Lore: Lookout is a self-appointed title that's mostly an excuse to beat things up.

Name: Verdant Longneck
Description: Battlecry: Adapt.
Lore: Always sticking its neck into other people’s business.

Name: Volatile Elemental
Description: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
Lore: Currently in an anger management class with Raging Worgen, Grommash Hellscream, and The Angry Chicken. It isn't helping.

Name: Mimic Pod
Description: Draw a card, then add a copy of it to your hand.
Lore: Jinx!

Name: Mirage Caller
Description: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 1/1 copy of it.
Lore: Mirage is actually the name of its long-lost cat.

Name: Biteweed
Description: Combo: Gain +1/+1 for each other card you've played this turn.
Lore: AKA Edwin VanLeaf.

Name: Meteor
Description: Deal 15 damage to a minion and 3 damage to adjacent ones.
Lore: When you absolutely, positively, have to kill all the dinosaurs.

Name: Fire Plume's Heart
Description: Quest: Play 7 Taunt Minions.Reward: Sulfuras.
Lore: Why does an active volcano need to be defended? To save its ash.

Name: Mechanical Yeti
Description: Deathrattle: Give each player a Spare Part.
Lore: The yetis of Chillwind Point are a source of both inspiration and savage beatings.

Name: Mechwarper
Description: Your Mechs cost (1) less.
Lore: Mechs that summon mechs? What's next? Donuts that summon donuts? Mmmmm.

Name: Micro Machine
Description: At the start of each turn, gain +1 Attack.
Lore: This card is the real thing.

Name: Ogre Brute
Description: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Lore: Ogres have really terrible short-term chocolate.

Name: Frost Nova
Description: Freeze all enemy minions.
Lore: Hey man, that's cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

Name: Frost Shock
Description: Deal 1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.
Lore: FROST SHOCK!

Name: Frostbolt
Description: Deal 3 damage to a character and Freeze it.
Lore: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

Name: Frostwolf Grunt
Description: Taunt
Lore: Grunting is what his father did and his father before that.   It's more than just a job.

Name: Kabal Lackey
Description: Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
Lore: I'll tell you one thing he doesn't lack: GUMPTION.

Name: War Golem
Description: N/A
Lore: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them.  Instinct, maybe?  A desire to blend in?

Name: Warsong Commander
Description: Your Charge minions have +1 Attack.
Lore: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

Name: Mistress of Mixtures
Description: Deathrattle: Restore 4 Health to each hero.
Lore: Her favorite mixture is cola and lime.

Name: Naga Corsair
Description: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
Lore: Hook-tails are nice and all but she keeps getting stuck on things.

Name: Potion of Madness
Description: Gain control of an enemy minion with 2 or less Attack until the end of the turn.
Lore: You'd be insane NOT to drink it!

Name: Axe Flinger
Description: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
Lore: Once a lowly "Stick Flinger", he's been relentless on the path to his ultimate dream: "Tauren Flinger".

Name: Blackwing Corruptor
Description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage.
Lore: He got his name when he gave Blackwing some comic books and rock & roll records.

Name: Blackwing Technician
Description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1/+1.
Lore: This is who you go to when your Blackwing needs a tune up. Don't go to a cut rate Blackwing tune up shop!

Name: Dragon's Breath
Description: Deal 4 damage. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Lore: Dragons breathe fire, sure, but did you know they can also breathe Cotton Candy?  It's harder to give them a reason to do that, though.

Name: Elder Longneck
Description: Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with 5 or more Attack, Adapt.
Lore: And so the bartender says, “Why the long neck?”

Name: Emerald Reaver
Description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to each hero.
Lore: Not to be confused with clubbing enthusiast Emerald Raver.

Name: Earthen Scales

Lore: You can make your own Earthen Scales at home. Step 1: Roll around in the dirt. Step 2: Magic.

Name: Living Mana

Lore: If you truly love your mana, set it free.

Name: Sunkeeper Tarim
Description: TauntBattlecry: Set all other minions' Attack and Health to 3.
Lore: Ironically, his favorite number is 4.

Lore: It's not HER fault you didn't put a spinning saw blade on your horse.

Name: Holy Champion
Description: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
Lore: She really likes seeing people get better.  That's why she hurts them in the first place.

Name: Ice Rager
Description: N/A
Lore: He's a lot cooler than Magma Rager.

Name: King's Elekk
Description: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
Lore: Elekk jousting is AWESOME.

Lore: Coming soon... to a tuskarr village near you!

Name: Lance Carrier

Name: Living Roots

Lore: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

Name: Lowly Squire
Description: Inspire: Gain +1 Attack.
Lore: But not the lowliest!

Name: Defender of Argus
Description: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Taunt.
Lore: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending.   But it does.

Name: Demolisher
Description: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
Lore: Laying siege isn't fun for anyone.  It's not even all that effective, now that everyone has a flying mount.

Name: Divine Favor
Description: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.
Lore: This is not just a favor, but a divine one, like helping someone move a couch with a fold out bed!

Name: Doomguard
Description: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
Lore: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

Name: Eaglehorn Bow
Description: Whenever a friendly Secret is revealed, gain +1 Durability.
Lore: First Lesson: Put the pointy end in the other guy.

Name: Emperor Cobra
Description: Poisonous
Lore: The Sholazar Basin is home to a lot of really horrible things. If you're going to visit, wear bug spray.  And plate armor.

Name: Equality
Description: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
Lore: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

Name: Ethereal Arcanist
Description: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
Lore: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

Name: Arcane Nullifier X-21
Description:
Taunt
Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Lore: There was some hard talk between gnome magi and engineers about inventing this mech.

Name: Bomb Lobber
Description: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion.
Lore: He lobbies Orgrimmar daily on behalf of bombs.

Name: Call Pet
Description:
Draw a card.
If it's a Beast, it costs (4) less.
Lore: Real hunters tame hungry crabs.

Name: Cobalt Guardian
Description: Whenever you summon a Mech, gain Divine Shield.
Lore: Guardians used to be built out of Adamantium, but production got moved to Gadgetzan and Cobalt was cheap.

Name: Dunemaul Shaman
Description:
Windfury, Overload: (1)
50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Lore: He just closes his eyes and goes for it. Raarararrrarar!

Name: Fel Cannon
Description: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to a non-Mech minion.
Lore: The box says, "New and improved, with 200% more fel!"

Name: Gnomish Experimenter
Description: Battlecry: Draw a card. If it's a minion, transform it into a Chicken.
Lore: He's legitimately surprised every time he turns himself into a chicken.

Name: Goblin Blastmage
Description: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Lore: If you can't find a bomb to throw, just pick up any goblin invention and throw that.

Name: Ancestral Healing
Description: Restore a minion to full Health and give it Taunt.
Lore: I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.

Name: Animal Companion
Description: Summon a random Beast Companion.
Lore: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

Name: Arcane Explosion
Description: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
Lore: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

Name: Arcane Intellect
Description: Draw 2 cards.
Lore: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

Name: Haunted Creeper
Description: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spectral Spiders.
Lore: Arachnofauxbia: Fear of fake spiders.

Name: Mad Scientist
Description: Deathrattle: Put a Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
Lore: His mother wanted him to be a mage or a warlock, but noooooooo, he had to go and be a scientist like his father.

Name: Nerub'ar Weblord
Description: Minions with Battlecry cost (2) more.
Lore: Weblords spend all day making giant trampoline parks.

Name: Poison Seeds
Description: Destroy all minions and summon 2/2 Treants to replace them.
Lore: "Poisonseed Bagel" is the least popular bagel at McTiggin's Druidic Bagel Emporium.

Name: Counterfeit Coin
Description: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
Lore: There is something funny about this coin… can't quite put my finger on it…

Name: Devolve
Description: Transform all enemy minions into random ones that cost (1) less.
Lore: Ragnaros looked down. He looked like some kind of War Golem. "WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME," he yelled. But all that came out was a deep grinding sound. He began to cry.

Name: Dispatch Kodo
Description: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack.
Lore: "Crime reported at First Bank of Gadgetzan. Huge quantities of Jade being carried away by what looks like a bunch of Hozen. Kodo 77 can you make it over there now?"

Name: Doppelgangster
Description: Battlecry: Summon 2 copies of this minion.
Lore: "Every me, get in here!"

Name: Genzo, the Shark
Description: Whenever this attacks, both players draw until they have 3 cards.
Lore: Infamous in the seedy underground card rooms of Gadgetzan, he got his nickname winning the coveted Shark Plushie in the city's first Hearthstone tournament.

Name: Hobart Grapplehammer
Description: Battlecry: Give all weapons in your hand and deck +1 Attack.
Lore: Grapplehammer is the horrible mind behind the Automatic Piranaha Launcher (banned in 7 districts)!

Name: Flame Geyser
Description: Deal 2 damage. Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
Lore: Oh, a wise geyser eh?

Name: Giant Mastodon
Description: Taunt
Lore: Still salty about it not being the "Year of the Mastodon."

Name: Cornered Sentry
Description: Taunt. Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Raptors for your opponent.
Lore: The Draenei are seriously considering cancelling "Bring Your Murderous Pet to Work Day."

Name: Corrupting Mist
Description: Corrupt every minion. Destroy them at the start of your next turn.
Lore: The most terrifying of Un’goro magics is both silent… AND deadly.

Name: Charged Devilsaur
Description: ChargeBattlecry: Can't attack heroes this turn.
Lore: What happens when a dinosaur mixes soda and pop rocks.

Name: Giant Anaconda
Description: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your hand with 5 or more Attack.
Lore: Must be something it ate.

Name: The Caverns Below
Description: Quest: Play four minions with the same name.Reward: Crystal Core.
Lore: Why can't it ever be The Taverns Below?

Name: Core Hound
Description: N/A
Lore: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

Name: Tanaris Hogchopper
Description: Battlecry: If your opponent's hand is empty, gain Charge.
Lore: The Hogchoppers are well-known throughout Kalimdor for being a real, actual group.

Name: Toxic Sewer Ooze
Description: Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.
Lore: When Sergeant Sally shows up unexpectedly, DO NOT FLUSH YOUR MANA CRYSTALS DOWN THE TOILET.

Name: Worgen Greaser
Description: N/A
Lore: Hair products are 79% of his monthly budget.

Name: Alley Armorsmith
Description: Taunt Whenever this minion deal damage, gain that much Armor.
Lore: The rent is cheap and she passes the savings onto YOU!

Name: Demonwrath
Description: Deal 2 damage to all minions except Demons.
Lore: Demons are not angry most of the time. You have to play this card in order to really bring it out of them.

Name: Stonehill Defender
Description: TauntBattlecry: Discover a Taunt minion.
Lore: Briefly tried stand-up comedy under the name "Stonehill Offender", but turtles are just too thin-skinned.

Name: Dinosize
Description: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 10.
Lore: Comes with fries and a drink.

Name: Gentle Megasaur
Description: Battlecry: Adapt your Murlocs.
Lore: "Low, low rents! Must enjoy a nomadic lifestyle. Quasi-sentient, bipedal, amphibious humanoids ONLY!"

Name: Pyros
Description: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand as a 6/6 that cost (6).
Lore: If you strike her down, she shall become more powerful than you can possibly… well, she'll become a 6/6 anyways.

Name: Discard
Description: Choose a hero.  That hero's controller discards his hand.

Name: Mogu'shan Warden
Description: Taunt
Lore: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King.   BOOOORRRINNG!

Name: Naturalize
Description: Destroy a minion. Your opponent draws 2 cards.
Lore: Another one bites the dust.

Name: Noble Sacrifice
Description: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
Lore: We will always remember you, "Defender!"

Name: Power of the Wild
Description: Choose One - Give your minions +1/+1; or Summon a 3/2 Panther.
Lore: Never look a panther in the eye.  Or is it 'Always look a panther in the eye'?  Well, it's one of those.

Name: Priestess of Elune
Description: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
Lore: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

Name: Deathwing
Description: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your hand.
Lore: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

Name: Edwin VanCleef
Description: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each other card you've played this turn.
Lore: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.

Name: Grommash Hellscream
Description: ChargeEnrage: +6 Attack
Lore: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

Name: Preparation
Description: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less.
Lore: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

Name: Pyroblast
Description: Deal 10 damage.
Lore: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

Name: One-eyed Cheat
Description: Whenever you summon a Pirate, gain Stealth.
Lore: When pirates say there is no "Eye" in "team," they are very literal about it.

Name: Powermace
Description: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly Mech +2/+2.
Lore: People assume that shamans control the elements, but really, they have to ask them stuff and the elements are like, "Yeah ok, sure."

Name: Recycle
Description: Shuffle an enemy minion into your opponent's deck.
Lore: Druidic recycling involves putting plastics in one bin and enemy minions in another bin.

Name: Scarlet Purifier
Description: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions with Deathrattle.
Lore: The Scarlet Crusade is doing market research to find out if the "Mauve Crusade" would be better received.

Name: Screwjank Clunker
Description: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +2/+2.
Lore: If it breaks, just kick it a couple of times while yelling "Durn thing!"

Name: Toshley
Description: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.
Lore: Something about power converters.

Name: Ironforge Rifleman
Description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
Lore: "Ready! Aim! Drink!"

Name: Ironfur Grizzly
Description: Taunt
Lore: "Bear Carcass 1/10"

Name: Kill Command
Description: Deal 3 damage.  If you have a Beast, deal 5 damage instead.
Lore: "Kill!", he commanded.

Name: Kobold Geomancer
Description: Spell Damage +1
Lore: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

Name: Voidwalker
Description: Taunt
Lore: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

Name: Voodoo Doctor
Description: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health.
Lore: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

Name: Rockpool Hunter
Description: Battlecry: Give a friendly Murloc +1/+1.
Lore: Loves crab meat. Fears crabs.

Name: Volcanosaur
Description: Battlecry: Adapt, then Adapt.
Lore: Always fun to say out loud "VOL-CA-NO-SAUUUR!"

Name: Unite the Murlocs
Description: Quest: Summon 10 Murlocs.Reward: Megafin.
Lore: Form feet and legs! Form arms and body! Oh. Sorry. I was thinking about Mechafin.

Description: Give a minion +1 Health.

Name: Temple Enforcer
Description: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
Lore: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

Name: Ogre Warmaul
Description: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Lore: Simple, misguided, and incredibly dangerous. You know, like most things ogre.

Name: Piloted Shredder
Description: Deathrattle: Summon a random 2-Cost minion.
Lore: Once upon a time, only goblins piloted shredders. These days, everyone from Doomsayer to Lorewalker Cho seems to ride one.

Name: Spellbender
Description: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
Lore: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

Name: Sword of Justice
Description: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1 Durability.
Lore: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

Name: Twisting Nether
Description: Destroy all minions.
Lore: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

Name: Healing Touch
Description: Restore #8 Health.
Lore: 8 Health, no waiting.

Name: Hellfire
Description: Deal 3 damage to ALL characters.
Lore: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

Name: Heroic Strike
Description: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn.
Lore: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.

Name: Hex
Description: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
Lore: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

Name: Holy Light
Description: Restore #6 Health.
Lore: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

Name: Holy Nova
Description: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.  Restore 2 Health to all  friendly characters.
Lore: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you're probably a jerk.

Name: Holy Smite
Description: Deal 2 damage.
Lore: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

Name: Houndmaster
Description: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2 and Taunt.
Lore: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It's rhetorical.

Name: Tracking
Description: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the others.
Lore: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put in their deck!

Name: Truesilver Champion
Description: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 2 Health to it.
Lore: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

Name: Tundra Rhino
Description: Your Beasts have Charge.
Lore: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos. Or am I mistaken?

Name: Vanish
Description: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

Name: Feugen
Description: Deathrattle: If Stalagg also died this game, summon Thaddius.
Lore: Feugen is sad because everyone likes Stalagg better.

Name: Mayor Noggenfogger
Description: All targets are chosen randomly.
Lore: This flavor text was randomly generated. If it happens to form words and make sense, that is purely by chance.

Name: Patches the Pirate
Description: Charge. After you play a Pirate, summon this minion from your deck.
Lore: What do sailors yell when Patches steals their treasure chest full of laws and other things being transported to parliament for a vote? "The Eyes have it!"

Name: Steam Surger
Description: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn,add a 'Flame Geyser'to your hand.
Lore: Explorers nicknamed him the Teapot Elemental.

Name: Hallucination
Description: Discover a card from your opponent's class.
Lore: It's the good kind of hallucination.

Name: Razorpetal Lasher
Description: Battlecry: Add a Razorpetal to your hand that deals 1 damage.
Lore: The reason why there are no zombies in Un'goro.

Name: Razorpetal Volley
Description: Add two Razorpetals to your hand that deal 1 damage.
Lore: The result of a fundamental misunderstanding of the phrase "flower power".

Name: Evolving Spores
Description: Adapt your minions.
Lore: The most powerful mushrooms are commonly found in boxes marked with "?".

Name: Feeding Time
Description: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Summon three 1/1 Pterrordaxes.
Lore: True, they're only 1/1s, but they eat as much as most 4/4s!

Name: Tol'vir Warden
Description: Battlecry: Draw two 1-Cost minions from your deck.
Lore: Ferocious in combat… and even more terrifying in pet battles.

Name: Vicious Fledgling
Description: After this minion attacks a hero, Adapt.
Lore: A youngster who is truly hungry for self-improvement.

Name: Sabertooth Lion
Description: Charge

Name: Sabertooth Panther
Description: Stealth

Name: Tiger Form
Description: Charge, Stealth

Name: Dream
Description: Return a minion to its owner's hand.

Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Description: When you draw this, take 7 damage and draw a card.

Name: Cursed!
Description: While this is in your hand, take 2 damage at the start of your turn.

Name: NOOOOOOOOOOOO
Description: Somehow, the card you USED to have has been deleted.  Here, have this one instead!
Lore: Even your flavor text has been deleted. Dang.

Name: OLDLegit Healer
Description: At the end of your turn, summon a random friendly minion that died this turn.

Name: OLDN3wb Healer
Description: At the end of your turn, heal 2 damage from adjacent minions.

Name: OLDN3wb Mage
Description: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to random enemy minion.

Name: Add 2 to Health
Description: Adds 2 health to a damaged character. Does NOT heal.

Name: Add 4 to Health.
Description: Adds 4 health to a damaged character. Does NOT heal.

Name: Opponent Disconnect
Description: Force your opponnet to disconnect.

Name: Remove All Immune
Description: Remove Immune from enemy hero

Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn
