Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Name: Devilsaur
Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Name: Shellshifter
Description: Taunt

Name: Cult Sorcerer
Description: Spell Damage +1After you cast a spell, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
Lore: No matter how many times we tell her not to, she keeps feeding C'Thun scraps under the table.

Name: Darkshire Librarian
Description: Battlecry: Discard a random card. Deathrattle: Draw a card.
Lore: Do NOT be late with your overdue fines.

Name: Demented Frostcaller
Description: After you cast a spell, Freeze a random enemy character.
Lore: He prefers that you refer to him by his nickname: 'Frostwaker.'

Name: Disciple of C'Thun
Description: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
Lore: C’Thun’s recruiting pitch involves cookies, which is why it’s the most popular Old God.

Name: Doomcaller
Description: Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is). If it's dead, shuffle it into your deck.
Lore: "Hello, is Doom there? No? Can I leave a message?"

Name: Eater of Secrets
Description: Battlecry: Destroy all enemy Secrets. Gain +1/+1 for each.
Lore: You don't want to be around after it has eaten an explosive trap.  You thought Sludge Belcher was bad...

Name: Evolve
Description: Transform your minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
Lore: So you say you want an evolution. Well, you know. We all want to change the board.

Name: Forbidden Ritual
Description: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many 1/1 Tentacles.
Lore: Actually, C'Thun gives his full support for this ritual.

Name: Dark Bargain
Description: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Discard 2 random cards.
Lore: A prime example of lose-lose negotiating.

Name: Dreadsteed
Description: Deathrattle: Summon a Dreadsteed.
Lore: Crescendo himself summoned this steed, riding it to victory in the Grand Tournament.  Wherever he rides, an army of riders ride behind him, supporting the legendary champion.

Name: Flame Juggler
Description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
Lore: At first he liked juggling chain saws, but then he thought, "Flames are better!  Because FIRE!"

Name: Flame Lance
Description: Deal 8 damage to a minion.
Lore: It's on the rack next to ice lance, acid lance, and English muffin lance.

Name: Flash Heal
Description: Restore 5 Health.
Lore: Flash!  Ahhhhhhh~

Name: Mortal Strike
Description: Deal 4 damage.  If you have 12 or less Health, deal 6 instead.
Lore: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

Name: Murloc Tidecaller
Description: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +1 Attack.
Lore: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

Name: Nourish
Description: Choose One - Gain 2 Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
Lore: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

Name: Onyxia
Description: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
Lore: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor.   You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

Name: Prophet Velen
Description: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
Lore: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

Name: The Beast
Description: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.
Lore: He lives in Blackrock Mountain.  He eats Gnomes.  That's pretty much it.

Name: Doomsayer
Description: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.
Lore: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

Name: Earth Elemental
Description: Taunt. Overload: (3)
Lore: Nothing beats rock.

Name: Gruul
Description: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .
Lore: He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller".  He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

Name: Harrison Jones
Description: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability.
Lore: “That belongs in the Hall of Explorers!”

Name: Anubisath Sentinel
Description: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +3/+3.
Lore: He's actually a 1/1 who picked up the hammer from the last guy.

Name: Bolvar Fordragon
Description: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1 Attack.
Lore: Spoiler alert: Bolvar gets melted and then sits on an ice throne and everyone forgets about him.

Name: Dr. Boom
Description: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots. WARNING: Bots may explode.
Lore: MARVEL AT HIS MIGHT!

Name: Flame Leviathan
Description: When you draw this, deal 2 damage to all characters.
Lore: Mimiron likes to take the Flame Leviathan out on some sweet joyrides.

Name: Foe Reaper 4000
Description: Also damages the minions next to whomever he attacks.
Lore: Foe reaping is really not so different from harvest reaping, at the end of the day.

Name: Gahz'rilla
Description: Whenever this minion takes damage, double its Attack.
Lore: The Sen'jin High football team is The Gahz'rillas.

Name: Flametongue Totem
Description: Adjacent minions have +2 Attack.
Lore: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems.  There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

Name: Novice Engineer
Description: Battlecry: Draw a card.
Lore: "Half of this class will not graduate… since they'll have been turned to chickens." - Tinkmaster Overspark, teaching Gizmos 101.

Name: Oasis Snapjaw
Description: N/A
Lore: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

Name: Timber Wolf
Description: Your other Beasts have +1 Attack.
Lore: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

Name: Totemic Might
Description: Give your Totems +2 Health.
Lore: Totem-stomping is no longer recommended.

Name: Ancient of Blossoms
Description: Taunt
Lore: His new shampoo is really working!

Name: Jade Blossom
Description: Summon a Jade Golem. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
Lore: Meditating under a jade blossom is said to grant you wisdom, unless you have a pollen allergy.

Name: Jade Chieftain
Description: Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem. Give it Taunt.
Lore: Seeing his Jade Golem grow up into the tall, handsome 6/6 standing before him was the proudest moment of his life.

Name: Jade Lightning
Description: Deal 4 damage. Summon a Jade Golem.
Lore: Jade Lightning, goooo Jade Lightning!

Name: Trogg Beastrager
Description: Battlecry: Give a random Beast in your hand +1/+1.
Lore: Still angry that the Gadgetzan Rager Club wouldn't accept him as a member.

Name: Virmen Sensei
Description: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2.
Lore: There is no carrot.

Name: Volcanic Potion
Description: Deal 2 damage to all minions.
Lore: The secret ingredient in Kazakus's award-winning chili recipe.

Name: Blubber Baron
Description: Whenever you summon a Battlecry minion while this is in your hand, gain +1/+1.
Lore: When oil, railroad, steel, robber, and red are all already taken, your options are limited.

Name: Shaku, the Collector
Description: Stealth. Whenever this minions attacks, add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
Lore: Aya even staged an intervention once, but Shaku still insists that he is not a hoarder.

Name: White Eyes
Description: TauntDeathrattle: Shuffle 'The Storm Guardian' into your deck.
Lore: My life for Aya!

Name: Wickerflame Burnbristle
Description: Taunt. Divine Shield. Damage dealt by this minion also heals your hero.
Lore: Wickerflame spent years as a recruit for the Goons, never making the big-time because he always fired his chest-cannon too slowly. "Hey," he thought, "maybe if I keep my beard lit on fire, I can do this faster." BOOM, promoted.

Name: Wrathion
Description: Taunt. Battlecry: Draw cards until you draw one that isn't a Dragon.
Lore: Wrathion, son of Deathwing, is a dragon. Why isn't he tagged as a dragon, you ask? WHAT, ARE YOU TRYING TO BLOW HIS COVER??

Name: Arcanologist
Description: Battlecry: Draw a Secret from your deck.
Lore: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.

Name: Binding Heal
Description: Restore 5 Health to a minion and your hero.
Lore: By accepting this healing, you agree to the following terms…

Name: Crackling Razormaw
Description: Battlecry: Adapt a friendly Beast.
Lore: Wasn't clever enough to go AROUND the electric fence.

Name: Envenom Weapon
Description: Give your weapon Poisonous.
Lore: Like Deadly Poison, but deadlier.

Name: Terrorscale Stalker
Description: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
Lore: Likes to scare his friends half to death.

Name: Hungry Crab
Description: Battlecry: Destroy a Murloc and gain +2/+2.
Lore: Murloc.  It's what's for dinner.

Name: Ice Block
Description: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.
Lore: Ice is nice, and will suffice!

Name: Kidnapper
Description: Combo: Return a minion to its owner's hand.
Lore: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

Name: Feign Death
Description: Trigger all Deathrattles on your minions.
Lore: The hardest part about doing a "Feign Death" convincingly is learning how to make the right smell. It takes a lot of commitment.

Name: Fel Reaver
Description: Whenever your opponent plays a card, remove the top 3 cards of your deck.
Lore: So reaver. Much fel. Wow.

Name: Hobgoblin
Description: Whenever you play a 1-Attack minion, give it +2/+2.
Lore: Hobgoblins are meeting next week to discuss union benefits.  First on the list: dental plan.

Name: Junkbot
Description: Whenever a friendly Mech dies, gain +2/+2.
Lore: One bot's junk is another bot's AWESOME UPGRADE!

Name: Unstable Ghoul
Description: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
Lore: Filling your Ghouls with Rocket Fuel is all the rage at Necromancer school.

Name: Voidcaller
Description: Deathrattle: Put a random Demon from your hand into the battlefield.
Lore: "Void!  Here, void!  Here, buddy!"

Name: Webspinner
Description: Deathrattle: Add a random Beast card to your hand.
Lore: Spider cocoons are like little piñatas!

Name: Zombie Chow
Description: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
Lore: Zombie.  It's what's for dinner.

Name: Lotus Assassin
Description: Stealth. Whenever this minion kills an enemy, gain Stealth.
Lore: For 5000g, you can just give the Jade Lotus any name and they will assassinate and/or embarrass them.

Name: Giant Wasp
Description: StealthPoisonous
Lore: Float like a butterfly, sting like a giant wasp!

Name: Glacial Shard
Description: Battlecry: Freeze an enemy.
Lore: Ice, ice, baby!

Name: Grievous Bite
Description: Deal 2 damage to a minion and 1 damage to adjacent ones.
Lore: Ooh. I'll have a bite of this, and of this, and of this...

Name: Sated Threshadon
Description: Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Murlocs.
Lore: Bet you can't eat just one murloc!

Name: Cruel Dinomancer
Description: Deathrattle: Summon a random minion you discarded this game.
Lore: As that old saying goes: "you don't get into dinomancing to make friends."

Name: King Mosh
Description: Battlecry: Destroy all damaged Minions.
Lore: He's a terror at concerts.

Name: Silence Destroy
Description: Silence and Destroy ALL Minions.

Name: Jade Golem
Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Name: Druid of the Flame
Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Name: Raptor
Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Name: Pyros
Description: Deathrattle:Return this to your hand as a 10/10 that costs (10).

Name: Fiery Bat
Description: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
Lore: He'll always be our first.

Name: Flamewreathed Faceless
Description: Overload: (2)
Lore: He's on fire! Boomshakalaka!

Name: Grotesque Dragonhawk
Description: Windfury
Lore: They say that "grotesque is in the eye of the beholder," but that's just because they've never seen a Grotesque Dragonhawk. Yikes!

Name: Hooded Acolyte
Description: Whenever a character is healed, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (Wherever it is).
Lore: Wait, what kind of acolyte doesn't wear a hood?

Name: Infested Tauren
Description: Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Slime.
Lore: The Overmind and the Old Gods are surprisingly similar.

Name: Mark of Y'Shaarj
Description: Give a minion +2/+2. If it's a Beast, draw a card.
Lore: Y'shaarj had three sons: Mark, Theodore, and Chris.

Name: N'Zoth's First Mate
Description: Battlecry: Equip a 1/3 Rusty Hook.
Lore: Hates when N'Zoth yells "Ahoy Matey!!", but there's not really much he can do about it.

Name: Nerubian Prophet
Description: At the start of your turn, reduce this card's Cost by (1).
Lore: It’s a self-reducing prophecy.

Name: On the Hunt
Description: Deal 1 damage. Summon a 1/1 Mastiff.
Lore: The mastiff giggles if you don't hit any ducks.

Name: Polluted Hoarder
Description: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
Lore: Roll ‘greed’ OR THIS COULD HAPPEN TO YOU.

Name: Possessed Villager
Description: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Shadowbeast.
Lore: It's like a pinata! A lame disgusting horrific pinata.

Name: Power Word: Tentacles
Description: Give a minion +2/+6.
Lore: Because you're wrapped in a protective layer of… tentacles?

Name: Mana Wyrm
Description: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
Lore: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

Name: Mark of Nature
Description: Choose One - Give a minion +4 Attack; or +4 Health and Taunt.
Lore: Druids call it the "Mark of Nature."  Everyone else calls it "needing a bath."

Name: Frigid Snobold
Description: Spell Damage +1
Lore: Ironically, the natural enemy of the snobold is THE CANDLE.

Name: Cult Master
Description: Whenever one of your other minions dies, draw a card.
Lore: She may be an evil cult master, but she still calls her parents once a week.

Name: Dark Iron Dwarf
Description: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
Lore: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore.    Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.

Name: Deadly Shot
Description: Destroy a random enemy minion.
Lore: Accuracy is not a highly valued trait among the mok'nathal.  Deadliness is near the top, though.

Name: Defias Ringleader
Description: Combo: Summon a 2/1 Defias Bandit.
Lore: He stole the deed to town years ago, so technically the town is his. He just calls people Scrub to be mean.

Name: Demonfire
Description: Deal 2 damage to a minion.   If it's a friendly Demon, give it +2/+2 instead.
Lore: Demonfire is like regular fire except for IT NEVER STOPS BURNING HELLLPPP

Name: Dire Wolf Alpha
Description: Adjacent minions have +1 Attack.
Lore: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

Name: Dread Corsair
Description: Taunt. Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
Lore: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

Name: Druid of the Claw
Description: Choose One - Transform into a 4/4 with Charge; or a 4/6 with Taunt.
Lore: Cat or Bear?  Cat or Bear?!  I just cannot CHOOSE!

Name: Big Game Hunter
Description: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 7 or more.
Lore: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him.  Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

Name: Blood Knight
Description: Battlecry: All minions lose Divine Shield. Gain +3/+3 for each Shield lost.
Lore: The Blood Knights get their holy powers from the Sunwell, which you should NOT bathe in.

Name: Brawl
Description: Destroy all minions except one.  (chosen randomly)
Lore: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

Name: Siltfin Spiritwalker
Description: Whenever another friendly Murloc dies, draw a card. Overload: (1)
Lore: The elements respond to anyone who calls them for a worthy cause, even if you call them by yelling, "MRGHRGLGLGL!"

Name: Steamwheedle Sniper
Description: Your Hero Power can target minions.
Lore: Goblins seldom have the patience for sniping. Most prefer lobbing explosives.

Name: Tree of Life
Description: Restore all characters to full Health.
Lore: Healing: It grows on trees!

Name: Wee Spellstopper
Description: Adjacent minions can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Lore: Bane of spellcasters and spelling bees everywhere.

Name: Ogre Magi
Description: Spell Damage +1
Lore: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

Name: Polymorph
Description: Transform a minion into a 1/1 Sheep.
Lore: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

Name: Fire Fly
Description: Battlecry: Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
Lore: Arch nemeses: small children with glass jars.

Name: Fire Plume Phoenix
Description: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.
Lore: This is what happens when you use a volcano as a bird bath.

Name: Ravasaur Runt
Description: Battlecry: If you control at least 2 other minions, Adapt.
Lore: Doesn't like to adapt unless others are watching. Some minions are such show-offs.

Name: Ravenous Pterrordax
Description: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to Adapt twice.
Lore: For better results, feed your pterrordax low-fat, high-fiber minions.

Name: Wisp
Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Name: Druid of the Fang
Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Name: Emergency Coolant
Description: Freeze a minion.

Name: Finicky Cloakfield
Description: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.

Name: Grant Mega-Windfury
Description: Give a minion Mega-Windfury.

Name: Mill 10
Description: Put 10 cards from a hero's deck into his graveyard.

Name: Crystal
Description: N/A
Lore: See this card on Hearthpwn

Name: Malchezaar's Imp
Description: Whenever you discard a card, draw a card.
Lore: Malchezaar used to have an imp named Dobby working for him, but there was a tragic accident.

Name: Medivh's Valet
Description: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 3 damage.
Lore: "Magus Medivh sir, I've brought the flaming balloons, as you requested."

Name: Menagerie Magician
Description: Battlecry: Give a random Beast, Dragon and Murloc +2/+2.
Lore: Just between us, if things get tight the Menagerie Magician position will probably be the first to go.

Name: Menagerie Warden
Description: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Beast. Summon a copy of it.
Lore: Please? Can I keep him? I promise to clean his cage every day.

Name: Netherspite Historian
Description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a Dragon.
Lore: She can tell you all about the history of people not STANDING IN THE GREEN BEAM!

Name: Nightbane Templar
Description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon two 1/1 Whelps.
Lore: Originally joined to be Arcanagos’ Templar, but has to admit that ordering pizza has become waaaay easier.

Name: Pantry Spider
Description: Battlecry: Summon a 1/3 Spider.
Lore: You have to admit, they make a cute couple.

Name: Far Sight
Description: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
Lore: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.

Name: Force of Nature
Description: Summon three 2/2 Treants.
Lore: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

Name: Gladiator's Longbow
Description: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
Lore: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

Name: Gorehowl
Description: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
Lore: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!

Name: Mal'Ganis
Description:
Your other Demons have +2/+2.
Your hero is Immune.
Lore: Mal'Ganis doesn't like being betrayed, so if you discard him, watch out.

Name: Malorne
Description: Deathrattle: Shuffle this minion into your deck.
Lore: When Malorne isn't mauling hordes of demons, he enjoys attending parties, though he prefers to go stag.

Name: Mekgineer Thermaplugg
Description: Whenever an enemy minion dies, summon a Leper Gnome.
Lore: He was obsessed with explosives until he discovered knitting. Now he yells, “SWEATERS! MORE SWEATERS!”

Name: Sacred Trial
Description: Secret: After your opponent has at least 3 minions and plays another, destroy it.
Lore: You have chosen poorly.

Give your opponent a 'Cursed!' card.

Choose an enemy minion.

Description: Deathrattle: Add a 3/2 weapon to your hand.
Lore: For a proper setting, place the deadly fork after the salad fork, but before the dinner fork.

Name: Enchanted Raven
Description: N/A
Lore: Once upon a midnight restive, Medivh pondered, feeling festive!

Name: Firelands Portal
Description: Deal 5 damage. Summon a random 5-Cost minion.
Lore: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"'

Name: Fool's Bane
Description: Unlimited attacks each turn. Can't attack heroes.
Lore: A fool and his bane are soon parted.

Name: Ironforge Portal
Description: Gain 4 Armor. Summon a random 4-Cost minion.
Lore: Come to beautiful Ironforge! Where irons are forged and the forges are iron!

Name: Kara Kazham!
Description: Summon a 1/1 Candle, 2/2 Broom, and 3/3 Teapot.
Lore: This is what happens when you tell Khadgar to set the table.

Name: Kindly Grandmother
Description: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/2 Big Bad Wolf.
Lore: "Goodness! What… abundant drool you have."

Name: Silent Knight
Description:
Stealth
Divine Shield
Lore: He used to be a librarian.  Old habits die hard.

Name: Silver Hand Regent
Description: Inspire: Summon a 1/1 Silver Hand Recruit.
Lore: The Silver Hand is the best paladin organization.  The Argent Crusaders are super jealous.

Name: Spellslinger
Description: Battlecry: Add a random spell to each player's hand.
Lore: Does he sling spells, or do his spells linger about.  Who can say?

Name: Totem Golem
Description: Overload: (1)
Lore: What happens when you glue a buncha totems together.

Name: Tournament Attendee
Description: Taunt
Lore: He was so excited to get season tickets to this year's Grand Tournament.  He normally doesn't get them at first and has to buy them from Ogre scalpers.

Name: Tournament Medic
Description: Inspire: Restore 2 Health to your hero.
Lore: The medic tournament is less entertaining than the Grand Tournament.

Name: Ancient Watcher
Description: Can't attack.
Lore: Why do its eyes seem to follow you as you walk by?

Name: Angry Chicken
Description: Enrage: +5 Attack.
Lore: There is no beast more frightening (or ridiculous) than a fully enraged chicken.

Name: Arcane Golem
Description: Battlecry: Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
Lore: Having Arcane golems at home really classes up the place, and as a bonus they are great conversation pieces.

Name: Argent Commander
Description: ChargeDivine Shield
Lore: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

Name: Armorsmith
Description: Whenever a friendly minion takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
Lore: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

Name: Auchenai Soulpriest
Description: Your cards and powers that restore Health now deal damage instead.
Lore: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.

Name: Bite
Description: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn and 4 Armor.
Lore: Chew your food!

Name: Blade Flurry
Description: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemy minions.
Lore: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

Name: Ancient Shade
Description: Battlecry: Shuffle an 'Ancient Curse' into your deck that deals 7 damage to you when drawn.
Lore: Warning: Do not expose to direct sunlight.
